job.title: AWS Data Engineer
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer & Network Security,Information Services
job.description: <p><strong>AWS Data Developer</strong></p><p><strong>Location: McLean; VA (Fortune 500 client)</strong></p><p><strong><u>2 Days ONSITE after Pandemic</u></strong></p><p><strong>12 Months Contract</strong></p><p><br></p><p><strong><u>AWS Data Developer</u></strong></p><ul><li>We are migrating the legacy based platform into cloud Solution (Hadoop to AWS migration). Refactoring the Compute into AWS where we have Kubernetes container based solutions.</li><li>5+ years of experience in software development including design, coding, testing, and support</li><li>3+ years of Cloud infrastructure experience working with one or more of the following Amazon Web Services (AWS) Cloud services: EC2, EMR, ECS, S3, SNS, SQS, Cloud Formation, Cloud watch, Lambda</li><li>Hands-on experiences with Python and PySpark</li></ul><ol><li>Hadoop and AWS - must have hands-on experience with development, not administration.&nbsp;</li><li>Python is a must have with Spark/PySpark.&nbsp;</li><li>Kubernetes knowledge is nice to have</li></ol>
